name: snippets
description: Expand snippets matching the current prefix with `tab`.

snippets.description: Snippets are text shortcuts that can be expanded to their definition.

snippetsResolver.description: Provide custom functions to resolve snippet variables and transforms.

implicitEndTabstop.description: Add a final tabstop at the end of the snippet when the $0 stop is not set

disableTabDedentInSnippet.description: When pressing shift-tab on the first placeholder, prevent the line from being dedented
